title: Congolese child soldiers prepare to return home
text:
Congolese child soldiers prepare to return home 1:39pm IST - 01:43 
Turning brutalized child soldiers back into ordinary children is no easy task. In the Democratic Republic of Congo, a U.N.-funded center is helping them to fight ostracism, superstition and their violent pasts to try to reunite them with their families. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Turning brutalized child soldiers back into ordinary children is no easy task. In the Democratic Republic of Congo, a U.N.-funded center is helping them to fight ostracism, superstition and their violent pasts to try to reunite them with their families.
